condition: [AND]([OR](<*ISSELECTED(Experion Server Type.Server)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Experion Server Type.Server TPS)*>),<*ISSELECTED(Server Mounting.Desk)*>)
name: show_desk_mount_server
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Trusted Platform Module1,Server Node Type_desk,Node Supplier_server,Additional Hard Disk1,Optional DVD_Server Disk,Displays_server01,Display Size_server,Display Supplier_Server,Trackball _Server,Server LocationClusterNetwork_desk mount  server1,Desk _Mount_Server)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory_Server Disk)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_Server Disk)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_Server Disk)*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory_Server Disk)*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Server LocationClusterNetwork_desk mount  server1:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
